column1: "description": "This table gives an over view of Ministry/Department - Wise Twelfth Five Year Plan (2012-17) Outlay for Transport Sectors. It gives the details regarding the Gross Budgetary Support (GBS) Outlay in the Twelfth Five Year plan (2012-17) and the Internal and Extra Budgetary Resources (IEBR). "
"title": "Download XLS for Ministry/Department \u2013 Wise Twelfth Five Year Plan (2012-17) Outlay for Various Transport Sectors"
Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
